channel.title: Where to start when making a rsps cheat client?
channel.description: Where do i start? Any tips or ideas?

item.title: Where to start when making a rsps cheat client?
item.dc:creator: @0belix 0belix
item.description:
@0belix wrote:

[quote=“RS From The 00s, post:8, topic:534293”][quote author=0belix link=topic=653087.msg4376201#msg4376201 date=1382121273]

Where do i start? Any tips or ideas?

Learn how client -> server protocol works and vice versa.
Then look for things that you can use to your advantage.

For example there’s a packet for clicking objects that requires 3 pieces of data. objectID, X, Y which you can just input said data but if the server doesn’t have a function for it nothing will happen.

Like say I use a prayer altar id. it’ll restore my prayer.
but if I use like a ladder id that isn’t coded into the server. nothing will happen. idk if that makes sense
[/quote]Makes sense thanks man :), trying to collect as much ideas & tips as i can.

https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?board=21.0[/quote]I love you man.

Read full topic
item.source: Where to start when making a rsps cheat client?
